metadata.title: CVE-2020-14304 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A memory disclosure flaw was found in the Linux kernel's ethernet drivers,in the way it read data from the EEPROM of the device. This flaw allows alocal user to read uninitialized values from the kernel memory. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2020-10-26').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
